subject: Re: new vs ->new
body:
Dr.Ruud wrote:
> "Adriano Ferreira" schreef:
> 
>> Definitely go with
>>  my $test = Some::Module->new;
> 
> or even with:
>    my $test = Some::Module::->new();
> 
While I am sure that will work...I have never seen it with parens after 
the new.

Robert
